title.text: An Empirical Approach to Text Categorization based on Term Weight Learning

abstractContent.text: In this paper) we propose a method for text categoriza-Lion task using term weight learning.
In our approach, learning is to learn true keywords from the error of clustering results.
Parameters of term weighting are then estimated so as to maximize the true keywords and minimize the other words in the text.
The characteristic of our approach is that the degree of context dependency is used in order to judge whether a word in a text is a true keyvv·ord or not.
The experiments using Wall Street Journal corpus demonstrate the effectiveness of the method.
